name: Froggy Chair

description: The Lily-Pad Table is a houseware item. The item's top surface can be used to place smaller items, such as miscellaneous furniture.

description: A green TV tray. The item's top surface can be used to place smaller items, such as miscellaneous furniture.

description: The Retro TV is a houseware item. you can interact with this item to turn it on and off. When turned on, a television program plays.

description: A heart shaped wall-mounted clock in pink.

description: A light brown and red seating chair.

description: A beige floor lamp with a yellow lampshade pattern.
